text: Lady at Midnight is a 1948 American mystery film directed by Sam Newfield and starring Richard Denning, Frances Rafferty, and Claudia Drake.Langman p.150 The film's sets were designed by the art director Edward C. Jewell. It was shot at the Universal Studios. ==Cast== * Richard Denning as Peter Wiggins * Frances Rafferty as Ellen McPhail Wiggins * Lora Lee Michel as Tina Wiggins * Ralph Dunn as Al Garrity * Nana Bryant as Lydia Forsythe * Jackie Searl as Freddy Forsythe * Harlan Warde as Ross Atherton * Claudia Drake as Carolyn 'Sugar' Gold * Ben Welden as Willie Gold * Rodney Bell as Joe Kelly - Pete's Co-Worker * Ben Erway as Dr. Adams * William Gould as Police Chief Mulhare * Sid Melton as Benny Muscle * Lee Roberts as Police Detective * Pierre Watkin as John Featherstone ==References== ==Bibliography== * Langman, Larry. A Guide to American Film Directors: the Sound Era, 1929-1979, Volume 2. Scarecrow Press, 1981 ==External links== * Category:1948 films Category:1948 mystery films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American mystery films Category:Films directed by Sam Newfield Category:Eagle-Lion Films films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Lady at Midnight
